1.  Never abandon a brother or sister in battle, no matter what.
2.  Once you are part of the Clan you can never leave.  If you do you will be shund upon by the Clan forever.
3.  Never beg, to do so brings shame upon you and the Clan.
4.  There is no one Leader, all  are equal in the Clan.
5.  The enemy of an individual member is an enemy of the Clan.
6.  The Clan shall not take crap off of anyone...
7.  We take care of our own.
8. Must be level 30+ to join.
